TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNameResolver

summary.span: 描述可返回 XAML 名称所指定对象的服务，或者返回推迟名称解析的标记。

span.span: Describes a service that can return objects that are specified by XAML name, or alternatively, returns a token that defers name resolution.

summary.span: 该服务还可返回 XAML 名称范围中所有命名对象的可枚举集合。

span.span: The service can also return an enumerable set of all named objects that are in the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不用于典型 XAML 方案的外部实现，因为它是一种服务。This interface is not intended for external implementation of typical XAML scenarios because it is a service. 此服务允许标记扩展和类型转换器将 XAML 名称解析为同一 XAML 源中的其他对象，同时它们仍处于 XAML 节点表示形式中。This service enables markup extensions and type converters to resolve XAML names to other objects from the same XAML source while they are still in a XAML node representation. 对于依赖于 XAML 名称的任何机制，可使用该服务来解析对环绕 XAML 生产的非线性访问。The service can be used to resolve forward references for any mechanism that relies on XAML names for nonlinear access to the surrounding XAML production. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 的类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml). 当 xaml 对象编写器调用值转换行为时，类型转换器和标记扩展可以在 xaml 对象编写器提供的服务上下文上查询为服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[可用于类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions)[的 XAML 的类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions). 此服务公开一个可延迟名称解析的 API。This service exposes an API that can defer name resolution. 服务实现的比喻是，应存储并使用在第一次传递时无法在部分名称对象图中解析的名称。The metaphor implemented by the service is that names that cannot be resolved in a first pass against a partial name-object graph should be stored and used to create the fixup token. 在默认行为中，将在第二次传递时提交其他解析尝试的所有此类名称。In the default behavior, all such names are submitted for another resolution attempt on a second pass. 在第二次传递中，整体名称对象图已完成，所有修复标记都可以解析。On the second pass, the overall name-object graph is complete, and all the fixup tokens are able to resolve. > [!NOTE] > 即使特定的实现允许使用这些方法，XAML 中的正向引用必然会产生性能后果。Even if they are permitted by a particular implementation, forward references in XAML inevitably have performance consequences. 作为生产质量的 XAML 的最佳实践，请尽可能避免使用向前引用。As a best practice for production-quality XAML, avoid forward references whenever possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>> GetAllNamesAndValuesInScope() cil managed
Public Function GetAllNamesAndValuesInScope () As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object))

summary.span: 返回 XAML 名称范围中所有命名对象的可枚举集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of all named objects in the XAML namescope.
An enumerable set of objects.

returns.span: 对于每个 ， 组件为字符串， 组件为在 XAML 名称范围中使用 名称的对象。

span.span: For each , the component is a string, and the component is the object that uses the name in the XAML namescope.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象可针对生成前向引用的某些标记模式进行修正。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFixupToken(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> names) cil managed
Public Function GetFixupToken (names As IEnumerable(Of String)) As Object

param.name: names
param.span: 可能转发引用的名称的集合。

span.span: A collection of names that are possible forward references.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象可针对生成前向引用的某些标记模式进行修正。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

returns.span: 一个为要稍后计算的查找行为提供标记的对象。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在标记扩展和类型转换器的架构上下文中可用的现有内部服务提供程序可以实现此服务;但是，它们返回的内部类型仅适用于默认 XAML 架构上下文中运行的现有 XAML 编写器。Existing internal service providers that are available in schema contexts for markup extensions and type converters can implement this service; however, they return an internal type that only the existing XAML writers that work under the default XAML schema context can process. 当所有正向引用名称都可解析时，将调用用户代码来重新分析列表中的每个名称。When all the forward referenced names are resolvable, the user code is called to reparse each name in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetFixupToken (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> names, bool canAssignDirectly);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFixupToken(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> names, bool canAssignDirectly) cil managed
Public Function GetFixupToken (names As IEnumerable(Of String), canAssignDirectly As Boolean) As Object
abstract member GetFixupToken : seq<string> * bool -> obj

param.name: names
param.span: 可能转发引用的名称的集合。

span.span: A collection of names that are possible forward references.

param.name: canAssignDirectly
param.span: 如果为 ，则立即将已解析的名称引用指派给目标属性。

span.span: to immediately assign the resolved name reference to the target property.

param.span: 如果为 ，则调用用户代码进行重新分析。

span.span: to call the user code for a reparse.
The default behavior is .

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象可针对生成前向引用的某些标记模式进行修正。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

returns.span: 一个为要稍后计算的查找行为提供标记的对象。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在标记扩展和类型转换器的架构上下文中可用的现有内部服务提供程序实现此服务;但是，它们返回的内部类型只能由在默认 XAML 架构上下文中工作的现有 XAML 编写器处理。Existing internal service providers that are available in schema contexts for markup extensions and type converters implement this service; however, they return an internal type that can only be processed by the existing XAML writers that work under the default XAML schema context. 如果 `canAssignDirectly` 为 `false` ，则在所有前向引用的名称都可解析时，将调用用户代码来重新分析列表中的每个名称。If `canAssignDirectly` is `false`, when all the forward referenced names are resolvable, the user code is called to reparse each name in the list.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定是否可调用 ，以便将名称解析为前向解析的标记。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether calling is available in order to resolve a name into a token for forward resolution.

value.span: 如果提供了 作为可为前向解析返回有用标记的实现，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is available as an implementation that returns a useful token for forward resolution; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`当未返回令牌时，此属性返回 ，因为在 第二次传递中涉及到现有令牌。This property returns `false` when does not return a token because a is involved in the second pass on an existing token.

summary.span: 在 XAML 处理器已向支持 XAML 名称范围注册了所有相关名称时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a XAML processor has registered all the relevant names to the backing XAML namescope.
Resolves an object from a name reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Resolve(string name) cil managed
Public Function Resolve (name As String) As Object

span.span: The name reference to resolve.
Resolves an object from a name reference.

returns.span: 解析的对象；或者为 null。

span.span: The resolved object; or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值返回为，则 `null` 可能存在前向引用。If a value is returned as `null`, a forward reference might exist. 要支持正向引用的实现可以 `FixupToken` 通过和 api 使用模式 。Implementations that want to support forward references can use the `FixupToken` pattern through the and APIs.

summary.span: 从名称引用解析对象，并提供一个跟踪值，该值报告是否为建立对象图而完全初始化对象。

span.span: Resolves an object from a name reference, and provides a tracking value that reports whether the object is fully initialized for object graph purposes.

returns.span: 一个为要稍后计算的查找行为提供标记的对象。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.
